user.help.tec.support.ques.protect.text: How to protect personal account information?
user.help.notice.rule.support.ques.use.a: Enjoying the services provided by the company is the customer’s own wishes, and the risk should be borne by the customer himself. Participating in our services means that customers agree that the services provided by our company are normal, reasonable, fair, and fair.

Certain laws and regulations in your country of residence do not expressly stipulate whether online and off-line gambling is allowed. Customers are responsible for ensuring that your gambling behavior is legal in your place at any time.
user.help.notice.rule.support.ques.bet.a: If your betting information is correct, you are the only person responsible for this bet. Once our company confirms your bet, the bet can be cancelled and withdrawn only a limited number of times, and the bet will be regarded as valid evidence of your bet.

All bets that show confirmation information in the company’s customer account transaction records are considered valid bets by the company. After each transaction is completed, please check your transaction records. If you have any questions, please contact the online verification, otherwise you accept that your bet is correct.
If the customer commits fraud, collusion, illegal or other misconduct, we have the right (the sole decision maker) to cancel the betting slip or any winnings.
We reserve the right to refuse any transaction or bet for any reason.
user.help.notice.rule.support.ques.discl: The company will not be responsible for any loss caused by poor or delayed satellite reception, network interruption, or personal error, negligence, or misunderstanding of website content under any circumstances.

The company does not give any responsibility for the company’s website, server or network interruption, the company’s server losing or destroying information, criminals attacking the website, server or network provider entering the site when the network is slow due to the network provider.
The security password is a six-digit pure number and the default is 123456

These rules and terms will apply to all betting types of the company. Members are responsible for ensuring that you are informed of all the rules and terms. We reserve the right to modify the terms at any time and will publish the modified content on this website. The information published on the website announcement can be used as additional rules and terms for betting. If there is any discrepancy or contradiction, the additional information will prevail. The company regards this item as fair and just. If you have any comments or questions, you can contact our customer service department. Our customer service team will sincerely assist each customer and ensure that your problems can be solved promptly and friendly. For any errors or disputes, our customer service team will do their best to provide services. All the terms are used to establish general principles between the member and the company. For any disputes that arise, it is hoped that both parties can get a satisfactory solution through this clause.
user.help.notice.rule.support.ques.gener: All betting in our company needs to be processed in accordance with the following rules and terms.

The maximum and minimum bets for all betting items will be determined by the company, and there is no need to notify in advance if there are any changes. Members need to provide correct personal information when applying for an account. The company will not be responsible for accounts that provide forged or incorrect information.

The member will be solely responsible for all transactions submitted by the account. Please check the options carefully before placing a bet. Once the bet is submitted successfully, it cannot be changed or cancelled. The company is not responsible for any omissions or repeated bets caused by members themselves. Members can view the details in the "Transaction History" to ensure that all submitted bets have been successful.
In any complaint, if there is no record stored in the company’s database, the company will not accept or approve the copies or receipts provided by any member.
The company reserves the right to close or freeze member accounts at any time.
The company reserves the right to suspend/suspend members from placing bets on any market at any time.

Information about the event, such as date, time, score, statistics, red cards and neutral positions, is for members’ reference only, and the company is not responsible for the accuracy of the information provided.

If a match or event is cancelled, interrupted or delayed and not restarted within 36 hours of the official kick-off time, all bets on that match will be considered void and cancelled, unless otherwise specified in the individual sports rules. Certain unconditionally terminated orders will be settled accordingly. The result of the company’s cancellation of all bets for this event is considered final, and there is no need to refer to the decision of the official tournament referee or related departments. The odds for the cancelled event will be calculated at 1.

If a match or event is cancelled, all bets on that match will be considered void and cancelled, unless otherwise specified in the individual sports rules. The company has the final right to interpret the definition and handling of cancellation.

If there is a dispute about the information in other languages   or the name of the team, the name of the English website shall prevail. The company does not give any responsibility for any loss caused by the following events.
user.help.privacy.support.ques.ans.norma: respects and values the privacy rights of members. We will do our best to ensure the security of your information and data so that customers have no worries. This is the purpose of our privacy policy.

will never disclose any personally identifiable information to any third party, unless it receives a court subpoena or is required by a feasible law and a judgment. We have the right to provide necessary personal information to relevant payment platform service providers and financial insurance institutions to complete payment requirements through the website.

All personal information provided by members is transmitted through a 128-digit SSL-encrypted secure port and stored in a confidential environment inaccessible to the general public. All internal access to data will be strictly restricted and closely monitored.
user.help.privacy.support.ques.ans.title: The following is the content of our rules on the privacy protection of customers' personal information:
user.help.privacy.support.ques.introduct: The website service is provided by. In order to allow customers to enjoy a safe and pleasant service experience here, we ask customers to read this “Privacy Policy” carefully, which will involve matters related to our use of your personal information. The company takes a rigorous attitude towards the personal privacy of customers. In order to allow customers to enjoy further services, sometimes we may need customers to provide personal information. This policy will cover the use of relevant customer personal information, as well as the procedures for recording relevant information. Sometimes, the customer may need to provide personal information (such as name, mailing address, email address, member account, phone or mobile number, date of birth or payment information) before accepting further services. In any case, we will check this policy To process your personal information. When using your personal information, we will apply the current legal terms and try our best to deal with it in the best and most secure way. At the same time, we will also monitor the content of your activities on this website, which may include your visits, pages visited, the original domain name of the network service, etc. This will help us to establish customer personal file data. Some of the data will be aggregated for statistics, which means that we will not be able to examine them individually.
user.help.privacy.support.ques.purpose.a: When a customer opens an account in , we have the right to ask you to provide certain personal information, such as: account number, mobile phone number, email address, password and confirm whether you are over 18 years old (OPE only accepts customers who have reached the legal age of 18 years old or above ). We may need to use your personal information to confirm your
user.help.privacy.support.ques.accessinf: During your visit to the pages of our website, there will be a small text folder "Information Recording Program" stored on your computer. Many websites have similar settings, because this setting is very useful for website publishers, for example, it can record whether the computer (or user) has visited this website.  will store and record customer "information recording procedures" and IP addresses. These data will help us improve and improve our services and help us analyze the complete information of customers. This type of data is not used to create files for customer personal information, so it will be erased regularly.
user.help.privacy.support.ques.confident: will do its best to protect the personal data provided to us by customers, and will not deliberately leak the data to outsiders, unless expressly stipulated in the terms of this policy. All  employees are required to follow the terms of this policy. Employees are obliged to strictly protect the personal information of customers, even after employees leave , they must still adhere to this obligation. You must also protect your personal information. You should strictly observe your account password and should not disclose it to others.
user.help.privacy.support.ques.recipient: In addition to the above statutory requirements, we may also disclose your personal information to our staff, staff of other related companies or ’s partners, and third-party network service providers who provide  customers with relevant services to ours ( Including but not limited to security, credit and risk review agencies). Third-party network service providers can check me
user.help.privacy.support.ques.monitor.a: For service quality assurance, fraud prevention and regulatory compliance reasons, we will store and monitor customer communication records (such as telephone and email records). Customers have the right to ask us not to use their personal information directly for marketing.

If you want to exercise this right, the customer should prepare the following; submit a written application and provide information that can prove your identity (such as account number, user name, registration information) and indicate where the personal information is incorrect and the content that needs to be corrected. Acknowledgement of the privacy protection rules Once a customer registers and opens an account in , it means that you agree to the terms of the privacy protection rules. We will update the terms of this policy on a regular basis, so we recommend that customers check it out regularly. If we change this policy, we will post a message on the relevant webpage. After the policy is changed, the customer’s continued use of the  website will be regarded as the customers’ approval of the policy change. If the customer does not accept this policy change, you can choose to deactivate our website service. If the policy
